{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Asoka |model=PL9560 |revision=WAP |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/19/2008 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Access Point, access point |fcc_id=T37PL9560-WAP |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8651C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Intellon |cpu2_model=INT6000 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=M29W640FB70N6E |fla1_num= |fla2=4 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V561620 |ram1_num= |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=Hynix |ram2_model=HY57V641620FTP-7 |ram2_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XG-623 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV, schematics |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Asoka |default_ssid_regex=^Asoka$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=welcome |oui=00:60:B3 |oui_eth=00:13:C1 }} '''PlugLink AV 9560 Wireless Adapter'''
===Marked boards=== *"50-9560-02Rev.A" and "2007-12-26" appears to be silkscreened on the main board. :"50-6300A-C1Rev.001" and "2007-09-26" is silkscreened on the expansion board. :"XG-623V1.1"<!--"2006/01/13"--> and "70-A06232-11N" is silkscreened on the wireless module board. :"50-8660-12Rev.001" and "2007-11-26" appears to be silkscreened on the power board.
Per the schematics, this device seems to be using the [[Intellon]] INT6000. :Flash specified as the M29W640FB70N6E (8MB), RAM specified as HY57V561620 (32MB)
It is shown with as such in the FCC EUT internal label and the FCC manual web UI screenshots. :Presumed 00:60:B3 ('''Z-Com''') OUI for the wireless interface. :Default settings are per the FCC manual.
